Welcome.Text: Choose a tab for more functionality.

Modules.Text: This page contains more advanced information.[newline][newline] Leave this for the developers.[newline][newline]

Roles.Text: This page contains information about all the roles.[newline][newline]

Pages.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_expand.gif[/img] Click on the arrow to see subpages.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible for all visitors.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden for all except admins.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking "Edit" or on the id.
Pages.Add: 1. Write a name for the page. [newline][newline] 2. Write a friendly URL for the page. [newline][newline] 3. Click "Save".

Users.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_user_active.gif[/img] User is active.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_user_unactive.gif[/img] User is inactive.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking "Edit" or on the id.[newline][newline]
Users.Add: 1. Choose a Role.[newline][newline] 2. Enter an email.[newline][newline] 3. Enter a username.[newline][newline] 4. Enter a password and verify it.[newline][newline] 5. Click "Save"
Users.Edit: 1. Control all your values and click "Save" to edit.

PageTemplate.Set: The first thing you need to do when creating a new page or a menu level is to choose the right template.[newline][newline] When you choose and save a template, you will automatically activate the next step of the page administration, which is adding and editing the actual content/modules.[newline][newline] 1. Select a template for the type of content you want to create. [newline][newline] 2. Click "Set Template".
PageTemplate.Remove: 1. Click "Remove Template" to remove the current template for this page.

Menu.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible for all visitors.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden for all except admins.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking "Edit" or on the title.
Menu.List2: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible for all visitors.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden for all except admins.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking "Delete".[newline][newline]
Menu.Behaviour: Sets whether the menu links will take you straight to the child or add a padding page.
Menu.Add: 1. Write a name for the page. [newline][newline] 2. Write a friendly URL for the page. [newline][newline] 3. Click "Save".
Menu.Edit: 1. Write a name for the page. [newline][newline] 2. Write a friendly URL for the page. [newline][newline] 3. Click "Save".

Meta.Text: This is where you add Meta-tag content your webpages.[newline] There are three different types.[newline][newline] 1. Add your title-tag. This is the title that will appear at the top left in your browser window. This is the tag search engines will look at first.[newline][newline] 2. Add keywords. Type your keywords in a comma-seperated list (dogs, dog, puppy...etc)[newline][newline] 3. Add a description. This is where you type a description of the page's content in a brief narrative.[newline][newline] 4. Control your input and click "Save & Close"

Default.Text: This is where you add Meta-tag content your webpages.[newline] There are three different types.[newline][newline] 1. Add your title-tag. This is the title that will appear at the top left in your browser window. This is the tag search engines will look at first.[newline][newline] 2. Add keywords. Type your keywords in a comma-seperated list (dogs, dog, puppy...etc)[newline][newline] 3. Add a description. This is where you type a description of the page's content in a brief narrative.[newline][newline] 4. Add an author. This is the person or organization responsible for the content.[newline][newline] 5. Add a copyright statement.[newline][newline] 6. Control your input and click "Save & Close"

TeaserBoxes.Text:
1. Choose the size (width) of your textbox.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure, select left.[newline][newline] 3. Write a header. [newline][newline] 4. Write a text. [newline][newline] 5. Write a text for extended article. [newline][newline]
6. Upload a media file.[newline][newline] 7. Write a tooltip text for the image. This text is shown when hovering with the mouse pointer over the image.[newline][newline] 8. Choose if your media file shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline]
9. Select a target if the media file shall be a link to another page. [newline][newline] 10. Select type. [newline] Internal link links to a page. Extended article displays article in window. [newline][newline] 11. Control your input and click "Save".

Exit.Text: 1. Write a title. [newline][newline] 2. Write a text. [newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save & Close".

Search.Text: 1. Write a title. [newline][newline] 2. Control your input and click "Save & Close".

TextBoxes.Text: 1. Choose the size (width) of your textbox.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure, select left.[newline][newline] 3. Choose whether you want your textbox to have a fontsize functionality.[newline][newline] 4. Write a header. [newline][newline] 5. Write an introduction. [newline][newline] 6. Write a text. [newline][newline] 7. Control your input and click "Save & Close".

MediaBoxes.Text: 1. Select a size (width) of the media.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure choose left.[newline][newline] 3. Upload a media file.[newline][newline] 4. Write a tooltip text for the image. This text is shown when hovering with the mouse pointer over the image.[newline][newline] 5. Choose if your media file shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline] 6. Select a target if the media file shall be a link to another page. [newline][newline] 7. Control your input and click "Save".

StartBox.Text: 1. To edit the content select a column above.[newline][newline] or[newline][newline] 1. Select the size (width) of the module.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure, select left.[newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save".
StartBox.Add: 1. Write a header [newline][newline] 2. Write a text. [newline][newline] 3. Upload a media file. [newline][newline] 4. Write a tooltip text for the image. This text is shown when hovering with the mouse pointer over the image. [newline][newline] 5. Write a link text.[newline][newline] 6. Select the page to which the link shall lead.[newline][newline] 7. Control your input and click "Save".

TabTextBox.List: Select a tab to edit.[newline][newline] or [newline][newline] Create a new tab by clicking the "Add tab" button above.[newline][newline] or [newline][newline] To edit the module, click "Module" in the navigation above.
TabTextBox.Add: 1. Check if the tab shall be visible.[newline][newline] 2. Write a tab name.[newline][newline] 3. Write a header.[newline][newline] 4. Write a text.[newline][newline] 5. Control your input and click "Save".
TabTextBox.Text: 1. Select a size (width) of the media.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure choose left.[newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save & Close".
TabTextBox.Edit: 1. Check if the tab shall be visible.[newline][newline] 2. Write a tab name.[newline][newline] 3. Write a header.[newline][newline] 4. Write a text.[newline][newline] 5. Control your input and click "Save".

News.Text: 1. Select a size (width) of the media.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure choose left.[newline][newline] 3. Write a title. [newline][newline] 4. Click on "Save & Close".
News.Add: 1. Choose if this item shall be shown on your webpage. [newline][newline] 2. Write a title. [newline][newline] 3. Write an introduction.[newline][newline] 4. Write an ingress.[newline][newline] 5. Write a text. [newline][newline] 6. Select a date.[newline][newline] 7. Control your input and click "Save".
News.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking on "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking on "Edit" or on the title.

GalleryBox.Text: 1. Select a size (width) of the media.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure choose left.[newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save".
GalleryBox.Add: 1. Choose if your Image shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline] 2. Upload a mediafile.[newline][newline] 3. Write a Image name for the image. This text is shown when hovering with the mouse pointer over the image.[newline][newline] 4. Control your input and click "Save".
GalleryBox.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking on "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking on "Edit" or on the title.

GalleryBox2.Text: 1. Select a size (width) of the media.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure choose left.[newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save & Close".
GalleryBox2.Add: 1. Upload a media file by clicking "Select".[newline][newline] 2. Add more upload fields by clicking "Add".[newline][newline] 3. Repeat step 1-2 until you're satisfied.[newline][newline] 2. Control your input and click "Save".
GalleryBox2.Edit: 1. Choose if your Image shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline] 2. Upload a mediafile.[newline][newline] 3. Write a Image name for the image. This text is shown when hovering with the mouse pointer over the image.[newline][newline] 4. Control your input and click "Save".
GalleryBox2.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking on "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking on "Edit" or on the title.

ProductBrowser.Text: Header: A header for the product.[newline][newline] Text: The text to show under price.[newline][newline] Category view text: The text to show in category module.[newline][newline] Choices title: Title shown if multiple choises is added.[newline][newline] Product ID: Unique id for the product.[newline][newline] Product name: Name displayed in cart.[newline][newline] Price: Can be a decimal number.[newline][newline] Old price: If this price is higher that the normal price a special price banner is displayed. Can be a decimal number.[newline][newline] Vat: Value added tax. Can be a decimal number.[newline][newline] Amount in stock: This is automatically deducted when a purchase is made.
ProductBrowser.ProductData: Name: The product name shown in the shopping cart.[newline][newline] Price: Can be a decimal number.[newline][newline] Vat: Value added tax. Can be a decimal number.
ProductBrowser.Add: 1. Upload a media file by clicking "Select".[newline][newline] 2. Add more upload fields by clicking "Add".[newline][newline] 3. Repeat step 1-2 until you're satisfied.[newline][newline] 2. Control your input and click "Save".
ProductBrowser.Edit: 1. Choose if your Image shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline] 2. Upload a mediafile.[newline][newline] 3. Write a Image name for the image. This text is shown when hovering with the mouse pointer over the image.[newline][newline] 4. Control your input and click "Save".
ProductBrowser.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking on "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking on "Edit" or on the title.

ContactBox.Text: 1. Select a size (width) of the media.[newline][newline] 2. Align it to the left or to the right. If you are unsure choose left.[newline][newline] 3. Write a title.[newline][newline] 4. Write a text.[newline][newline] 5. Write a policy text.[newline][newline] 6. Write a confirmation text.[newline][newline] 7. Write a subject for the e-mail.[newline][newline] 8. Write a e-mail address that will be used as the sender.[newline][newline] 9. Control your input and click "Save & Close".[newline][newline]
ContactBox.AddCategory: 1. Choose if the item shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline] 2. Write a name.[newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save".
ContactBox.AddSubCategory: 1. Choose if the item shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline] 2. Choose the parent item of this item.[newline][newline] 3. Write a name.[newline][newline] 4. Write a valid e-mail address for the recipient of the message.[newline][newline] 5. Control your input and click "Save".
ContactBox.AddClient: 1. Choose if the item shall be shown on your webpage.[newline][newline] 2. Write a name.[newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save".
ContactBox.CategoryList: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking on "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking on "Edit" or on the title.
ContactBox.ClientList: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking on "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking on "Edit" or on the title.

RSS.Text: 1. [ ADMIN : SIZE ][newline][newline] 2. [ ADMIN : ALIGN ][newline][newline] 3. Write a title. [newline][newline] 4. Enter the url for your rss. [newline][newline] 5. Choose a default number of items to show. [newline][newline] 6. Control your input and click "Save".

Footer.Text: 1. Write a copyright text for the content on this website. [newline][newline] 2. Write informational texts, i.e. contact information, visiting adress, phone number etc. [newline][newline] 3. Click "Save & Close".
Footer.Add: 1. Choose if this item shall be shown on your webpage. [newline][newline] 2. Write a link name. [newline][newline] 3. Choose a column. [newline][newline] 4. Select a type for your item. [newline][newline] 5. Write a link name if you chose a external link.[newline][newline] 6. Select a internal link if you choosed an internal link.[newline][newline] 7. Control your input and click "Save".
Footer.List: [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_on.gif[/img] Item is visible.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_visible_off.gif[/img] Item is hidden.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_up.gif[/img] Move item up in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_arrow_down.gif[/img] Move item down in the order.[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_bullet_delete.gif[/img] Delete Items by clicking "Delete".[newline][newline] [img]../../../App_Themes/WebAdmin/Images/icon_edit.gif[/img] Edit Items by clicking "Edit" or on the Title.

DeleteModule.Text: 1. Click "Delete Module" to remove this module from the page. [newline][newline]

EditModules.Text: 1. Add a module by clicking on the modules icon. [newline][newline]

Unregister.Text: 1. Write a title.[newline][newline] 2. Write a text.[newline][newline] 3. Control your input and click "Save & Close"
